titleStmt.title: A speech of Mr. Iohn White counsellor at law, made in the Commons House of Parliament concerning episcopacy.
titleStmt.author: White, John, 1590-1645.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Nicholes, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the Bible in Popes-head alley,
